tp:docstring.p: Close the view so we won't receive notifications about its result anymore. Method calls on the view are no longer valid after this call, and the connection manager may remove the object from the bus at any point.
An object representing the result of an activity search.
Activities room handles are stored using the org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Interface.Group interface.
Activity properties changes are notified on the Connection object using the org.laptop.Telepathy.ActivityProperties interface while the view object is alive.
